    # File lib/alchemy/action_view.rb, line 4
 4:   def alchemy_selectbox_tag(name, values, selected_value, options = {})
 5:     id = name.gsub(/(\[|\])/, '_') + '_select'
 6:     selected_value = values.detect(){ |v| v[1] == selected_value }
 7:     nothing_selected = selected_value.blank?
 8:     first_value = (values[0][0] rescue '&nbsp;')
 9:     if nothing_selected
10:       if !options[:prompt].blank?
11:         select_box_content = options[:prompt]
12:       elsif !options[:include_blank?].blank?
13:         select_box_content = "&nbsp;"
14:       else
15:         select_box_content = first_value
16:       end
17:     else
18:       select_box_content = selected_value[0]
19:     end
20:     html = Alchemy::ActionView.get_html_scaffold(:prefix, id, select_box_content, '', options)
21:     unless options[:prompt].blank? || nothing_selected
22:       html += %(<a href="#" rel="">#{options[:prompt]}</a>)
23:     end
24:     values.each do |value|
25:       selected = (selected_value[1] == value[1] rescue false)
26:       html += %(
27:         <a href="#" rel="#{value[1]}" title="#{value[0]}" class="#{selected ? 'selected' : nil}">#{value[0]}</a>
28:       )
29:     end
30:     html += Alchemy::ActionView.get_html_scaffold(:suffix, '', '', '', options)
31:     if !options[:prompt].blank? && nothing_selected
32:       html += self.hidden_field_tag(name)
33:     else
34:       html += self.hidden_field_tag(name, (values[0][1] rescue '&nbsp;'))
35:     end
36:     html += Alchemy::ActionView.get_html_scaffold(:js, id, '', name, options)
37:     return html
38:   end
